subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Brian Gionta scored twice during a three-goal second period last night for the visiting Devils, and Martin Brodeur made 34 saves in a 3-2 victory over Tampa Bay.
snippet: Brian Gionta scored twice during a three-goal second period last night for the visiting Devils, and Martin Brodeur made 34 saves in a 3-2 victory over Tampa Bay.
